turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a drink from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I get started for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a venti cinnamon almond milk macchiato with coconut milk and half the syrup and an extra shot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay! let me see.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can only find an Cinnamon Dolce Latte, is that what you're looking for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, cinnamon almond milk macchiato.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh I see! give me a moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright you're looking for a Venti Cinnamon Macchiato, with Almond milk and Coconut milk, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: With Just with coconut milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, what exactly is the Almond part within the drink you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Leave out the omen part.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay got it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Venti Cinnamon Macchiato, with Coconut milk. WHat else did you want to add?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a half half the syrup and an extra shot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, lite on the syrup and an extra shot, got it!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And can I pick that up at the Starbucks in Harbison Court at 276 Harbison Boulevard in Columbia, South Carolina?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Give me a moment to find that location.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It looks like they do not serve coconut milk at that location. Would you like to substitute the milk with something else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: or get a different drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Almond milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Switching it to almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They do serve almond milk. So no problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will go ahead and send your order, is that okay?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thank you! okay, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, your order has been sent to your desired location. It will be ready for pickup in 5-8 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Goodbye!
